segments.text: We like your product , and are interested in placing an order with you as soon as possible .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , we can proceed with the order until after the Christmas holidays . Our factories will be closed for another week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's all right . We will send you a purchase order in one week . I hope you will be able to take care of it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . Once we get your purchase order , we will begin the execution of the order right away .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . We need the products in less than one month , because we have a big deal with another company . By the way , will payment against delivery be OK ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That will be fine . And I can promise you that you'll get the goods about two weeks after we get your purchase order .
segments.speaker: S2
